MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:15am in order to remove generators and reconnect the mains supply and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:05am on Thursday, 15 October 2020
